Princes Street Hostel opening

Much like our city, we are ever evolving. Prince's Street Hostel has existed since the 1980s and whether in Old Town or New Town we remain the first hostel Edinburgh has ever known. After a complete upgrade of facilities over the past 2 years we are now excited to reopen to travelers from all over the globe. With a brand new kitchen with modern appliances and acompanying communal dining room and lounge area. All the rooms we offer have been freshly refurbished and are waiting for you to book them. We are a stones throw from Princes Street, one of Edinburgh central high streets, surrounded by bars, shops and cafes. The Princes Street Hostel is also right off Waverley train station and the iconic Balmoral building, and as we are overlooking North Bridge which let you go from Old to New town in a brisk.

Rooms & Facilities

From cosy double rooms to large dorm bunks, including a female only room, we provide accomodation to fit all and any of your preferences.

Groups

We welcome groups for any occasion ! Please reach out to us by clicking the button below and filling out our form.

Tours and Activities

Discover Edinbugh and the cities around it ! Book an experience with our partners to discover the castles, lochs, whiskies and more. Without forgetting the cities magical Hary Potter history.
